mapper.select: select b.img_path, b.book_name, b.stock, c.quantity, b.price,b.book_id from book b, cart c where b.book_id = c.book_id and c.member_id = #{member_id}

select b.order_id, b.order_date, m.name, m.addr1, m.addr2,b.total_price from book_order b, member m where b.member_id = b.member_id and m.member_id = #{member_id} and b.order_id = (select max(order_id) from book_order)
select b.book_name, o.quantity from book b, order_detail o where b.book_id = o.book_id and b.book_id = #{book_id}
select count(book_id) from cart where book_id = ${book_id} and member_id = '${member_id}'
